Pruebo mi funcion del canion

```{r}
tiro <- function(d,h, col){
  a <- -h/(d/2)^2
  b <- 4*h/d
  c <- h+a*(d/2)^2
  
  curve(a*x^2+b*x+10+c, from = 0, to = d, add = TRUE, col = col)
}
tiro(1000,10, "green")
tiro(100,10, "blue")
tiro(100,5, "red")
```

Ahora puedo calcular cualqier tiro parabolico qe qiera, sabiendo la distancia y altura maxima.
```{r}
par(mfrow=c(2,2))
curve(x^3-3*x, -2, 2)
curve(x^2-2, add = TRUE, col = "violet")

curve(sin, -pi, 3*pi)
plot(cos)
chippy <- function(x) sin(cos(x)*exp(-x/2))
curve(chippy, -8, 7, n=2001)

for(ll in c("","x","y","xy"))
  curve(log(1+x), 1,100, log=ll, sub=paste("log=",ll))

```
